◆ EmbedBuilder() [1/2]

discpp::EmbedBuilder::EmbedBuilder ( const std::string &  title,
const std::string &  description,
const Color &  color 
)

Constructs a discpp::EmbedBuilder object with a title, description, and color.

discpp::EmbedBuilder embed("Banned players", "This is a list of banned players from this guild", 0xffbb00);
Parameters
[in]titleThe title of the embed.
[in]descriptionThe description of the embed.
[in]colorThe color of the embed.
Returns
discpp::EmbedBuilder, this is a constructor.

Add a field to the embed.

embed.AddField("This is a field title", "This is a big long description", false);

◆ GetFields()

std::vector< std::tuple< std::string, std::string, bool > > discpp::EmbedBuilder::GetFields ( ) const

Get fields of the embed.

This is a vector filled with title, then value string pairs so: std::pair<title, value>.

Returns
std::vector<std::tuple<std::string, std::string, bool>>. Think of it as: std::vector<std::tuple<title, value, inline>>.

◆ GetFooter()

std::pair< std::string, std::string > discpp::EmbedBuilder::GetFooter ( ) const

Returns
std::pair<std::string, std::string>. Think of it as: std::pair<text, url>.
